ygData.subject: Following Megatrons troops
ygData.msgSnippet: Megatron saw as Waspinator burst apart from the numerous missles fired by Megaton. It was quite remarkable. How magnificent! I must say you do prove yourself

--part1_e0.e0d5d5a.2774e5e6_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Megatron saw as Waspinator burst apart from the numerous missles fired 
by Megaton. It was quite remarkable. "How magnificent! I must say you do 
prove yourself very well."
       Waspinator attempted to get back onto his feet, but mubled something 
and went into stasis lock.
       "You seem like Predacon material. How would you like to be my Assault 
Commander? You could lead my troops into battle. I like your...style of 
fighting." Megatron said, waving the smoke from Waspinator with his hand. 
"Yesss."

       Nighteyes, in her panther beast mode, padded quietly across the 
ground, and crouched low as not to be seen. She was spying on Killfest. Her 
orders were to find out where the heck he was going on his secret mission. 
The Predacons could intercept transmissions, and decode them, but trying to 
figure some of them out was just insanity. Thats why Hell Beast
sent her, he couldnt make heads or tails about this little move.
       Her eyes began to magnify. About 400 yards away, she saw Killfest and 
some of the bots in the Ambush. She was to far away to make out what they 
were saying. For that she would have to move in closer.
       Like a burst of wind, she lept up and ran as fast as she could under 
the cover of the brush. Eyes dialated, and ears listening, she stopped and 
made it into a tree. Now, about 170 yars closer, she began to pick up the 
conversation a little bit. Her audio receptors raised to full power, and she 
could hear Killfest and his men like a whisper.

       Hell Beast coughed agian. This virus or whatever was making him sick. 
He needed a cure. Someone had to have it...someone.
       He scanned through the names of bots who he thought might have a cure, 
or know something about treating him. His eyes rested on Shockwave. He was 
smart, and most likely had experience in Virus warfare such as this.
       "This is Senator Hell Beast calling Shockwave. I ask for you 
assistance in treating a rather pesky virus I was recently injected with. 
Help would be appreciated, and payed for." He ended the transmission, wrapped 
a blanket around him, and dazed out in his sickness.


--part1_e0.e0d5d5a.2774e5e6_boundary
